meanings.definition: The quality or state of being frequent.
meanings.sent1: Her frequentnesses in attending the meetings impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The frequentnesses of his visits to the gym showed his dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent3: The frequentnesses of her laughter brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The frequentnesses of the waves crashing against the shore lulled him to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The frequentnesses of the bird's chirping created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The frequency or rate of occurrence of something.
meanings.sent1: The frequentnesses of earthquakes in that region are concerning.
meanings.sent2: The frequentnesses of his migraines have increased lately.
meanings.sent3: The frequentnesses of his jokes made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The frequentnesses of rain in the summer was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The frequentnesses of car honking in the city can be overwhelming.
